name: World Creater!
description:
In this game you can create an island, name it, nuke it and spread viruses on it. 

Update list:

V3.7: Added all the buttons, new generation, added new buttons like saving and loading, settings and new music. (4 new OST)

V3: Added the Restart button and Sell Resource button and adding a Free shipment every few minutes.

V2: Added Shipment button, added easter eggs and added pin button.

V1: Added Show/Hide button, nuke button and virus button and more.

V0.5: Added Generate button.
